samples.context: In the city zoo of Animalia, there was a lioness named Nala. If Nala was given proper veterinary care, then Nala would remain healthy. Also, if Nala was given proper veterinary care, then Nala would live longer in captivity.
samples.question: Does this entail that if Nala was given proper veterinary care, then Nala would remain healthy and live longer in captivity?

samples.context: In the prestigious university of Hilltop Heights, there was an intelligent student named Jamie. If Jamie put in the hard work, then Jamie would get good grades. Moreover, if Jamie put in the hard work, then Jamie would gain more knowledge.
samples.question: Does this entail that if Jamie puts in the hard work, Jamie gets good grades and gains more knowledge?

samples.context: At the bustling cafe Espresso Love, there was a special drink called the Caramel Macchiato. If the Caramel Macchiato was prepared properly, then it would have a rich flavor. Additionally, if the Caramel Macchiato was prepared properly, then it would have a smooth texture.
samples.question: Does this entail that if the Caramel Macchiato was prepared properly, then it has a rich flavor and smooth texture?

samples.context: In the corporation of TechComp, there was an employee named David. If David completed more projects efficiently, then David would gain recognition from management. Additionally, if David completed more projects efficiently, then David would likely receive a promotion.
samples.question: Does this entail that if David completed more projects efficiently, then he would gain recognition from management and likely receive a promotion?

samples.context: In the Hayden Observatory, there was a powerful new telescope named Supernova 5000. If the Supernova 5000 was calibrated precisely, then it would capture clearer images of distant galaxies. Furthermore, if the Supernova 5000 was calibrated precisely, then it could detect more faint celestial objects.
samples.question: Does this entail that if the Supernova 5000 was calibrated precisely, then it would capture clearer images of distant galaxies and detect more faint celestial objects?

samples.context: At the local animal shelter, there was a puppy named Rex. If Rex was trained consistently, then Rex would become well-behaved. Additionally, if Rex was trained consistently, then Rex would learn commands easily.
samples.question: Does this entail that if Rex was trained consistently, then Rex became well-behaved and Rex learned commands easily?

samples.context: In the quiet town of Stillwater, there was a girl named Sarah. If Sarah practiced piano daily, then Sarah would improve her skills. Also, if Sarah practiced piano daily, then Sarah would learn new songs.
samples.question: Does this entail that if Sarah practiced piano daily, then Sarah would improve her skills and learn new songs?

samples.context: In the boring town of Dallas, there was a student named John. If John studied hard, then John would get good grades. Also, if John studied hard, then John would gain knowledge.
samples.question: Does this entail that if John studied hard, then John would get good grades and gain knowledge?

samples.context: In the agriculture hub of Golden Acres, there was a farmer named Jack who grew tomatoes. If Jack watered the tomatoes daily, then the tomatoes would grow big and juicy. Also, if Jack watered the tomatoes daily, then the tomatoes would ripen fully.
samples.question: Does this entail that if Jack waters the tomatoes daily, then the tomatoes grow big and juicy and ripen fully?

samples.context: At the local gym, there was a member named Amanda. If Amanda lifted weights regularly, then Amanda would gain strength. Additionally, if Amanda lifted weights regularly, then Amanda would tone her muscles.
samples.question: Does this entail that if Amanda lifted weights regularly, then Amanda gained strength and Amanda toned her muscles?
